myPhilosophy: Be it objectivist epistemology shaping my weltanschauung or pflichterfullung learned as part of my culture growing up, it all boils down to the quality of our lives and how well we take responsibility for ourselves as well as being erudite, together with a sense of Gezelligheld from my perspective, is what makes us co-exist to achieving a better civilization.

aboutme-msg-one: Navigating the terrace of the intellectual world, I have always taken up the gauntlet by following my passion, doing research, practicing by my volition to improve my proficiency, as well as mentored to become a better individual and harness my creative prowess within.
aboutme-msg-two: I possess good fundamentals, great technical skills and a general understanding of software development processes to meet the required client and market demands as a developer, coupled with hands-on industry-level experience to take a product from its inception to reality within its time-bound.
